mapper.select: SELECT g.num, g.p_num, g.price, g.name, g.due_ship, NVL(g.num_component,0) num_component, NVL(g.num_component,0)-buy rest_cnt, NVL(cnt,0) com_cnt FROM gift g LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT d.g_num, count(*) cnt FROM gift g LEFT OUTER JOIN gift_detail d ON g.num = d.g_num GROUP BY d.g_num ) a ON g.num=a.g_num LEFT OUTER JOIN ( select g.num, count(s.num) buy from gift g LEFT OUTER JOIN support s ON g.num=s.g_num where g.p_num = #{p_num} group by g.num )b ON g.num=b.num WHERE g.p_num=#{p_num} ORDER BY g.num
